input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Pedal Mafia"
Reference Product Name: "Core Jersey White/Black"
Reference Product Description:
The all-new Core Jersey is a high-quality staple for cyclists in pursuit of optimal comfort and durability. Our sustainable manufacturing process has evolved to incorporate recycled yarns, while the ultra-soft knitted fabric provides superior durability and form-fitting compression for all body types. Lightweight construction enhances the freedom of movement, and advanced moisture-wicking technology regulates body temperature during intense rides. With three convenient rear pockets and a zipper-secured storage pocket, youâ€™ll have ample space to stow your riding essentials. Arriving in five new colourways, the reimagined CORE Jersey is a must-have addition to your cycling wardrobe.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Sportful Men's Snap Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Man Sportful Breakout Supergiara Jersey'
  - Name='Maap Aether Pro Air 3.0 Jersey'
  - Name='MAAP Men's Blurred Out Pro Hex Jersey 2.0'
  - Name='MAAP Evade X Pro Air 2.0 Jersey'
  - Name='Assos Men's Equipe R Jersey S11'
  - Name='MAAP Aeon Jersey'
  - Name='Assos Mille GT Jersey'
  - Name='Assos Equipe RS SS EVO Limited Edition Jersey Aqua, S'
  - Name='ASSOS Uma Gt Jersey C2 Gruppetto'
  - Name='Mens Core Bib Zwift 10 Year Anniversary'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Core Jersey'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Nomadic Tech Short Sleeve T-Shirt'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Gym Shirt'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: A men's cycling jersey from a reputable brand, likely with similar features (fit, moisture-wicking) and intended use as the reference Core Jersey.
Another cycling jersey from Sportful designed for performance; closely related in function and use though model specifics may vary.
High-end performance cycling jersey from MAAP, similar technical construction and intended cycling use aligning closely with the Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: MAAP Men's Blurred Out Pro Hex Jersey 2.0
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Performance cycling jersey, similar compression and moisture management features typical of high-quality cycling jerseys like the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: MAAP Evade X Pro Air 2.0 Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High-performance cycling jersey with technical fabric, close match in function and form for cyclists.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Men's Equipe R Jersey S11
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Premium cycling jersey from Assos with technical features and design tailored for comfort and durability in cycling, similar to the Core Jersey.
Cycling jersey from MAAP, likely with performance focus; relevant though model may be slightly different in fit or construction.
Technical cycling jersey for high comfort and performance, very similar intended use and features as the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Equipe RS SS EVO Limited Edition Jersey Aqua, S
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A cycling jersey optimized for racing and performance, sharing form-fitting compression and moisture-wicking features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: ASSOS Uma Gt Jersey C2 Gruppetto
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Women's cycling jersey from Assos; shares construction and technical features though aimed at a different gender segment.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Mens Core Bib Zwift 10 Year Anniversary
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Bib shorts are cycling apparel but a different product category and silhouette from the jersey; related but low relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Core Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Exact product from the reference brand and closely matches all described features and intended cycling use, therefore maximum relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Nomadic Tech Short Sleeve T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Though technical and from same brand, a short sleeve t-shirt will differ in fit, compression, and cycling-specific features compared to the Core Jersey.
Gym shirt is casual or fitness apparel but not a cycling jersey; function and construction differ markedly from the reference product.
